Key:
*Grunt*... Another dream... Rather, another
illusion shown to us by the mastermind
of this world.
It seems like another unusual date scenario.

Unfortunate. We're back. I wish I was your manager
for just a little longer.

From my point of view, I was suddenly forced to
exercise, so I'm really tired...

Regardless... This kind of strange thing is going
to continue, isn't it?

Deduction. Unless we escape this world, I believe
this type of unpredictable incident will occur at
any time.

Hehehe, interesting. To shroud this phantom veil
over the Yamai Sisters. They may be surprised
to find a horrific curse of their own as payback.

Motivated. I don't know what will happen next, but
as long as Kaguya and Yuzuru are together, there
is nothing to be afraid of.
Kaguya and Yuzuru seem to be oddly pumped.
